title: 5v5 Ranked Team Expands
body:
Hello there guys,
iam in work to create a serious team,
Requirements and what we can offer:

-The team got a Daily Playtime Shedule allready.
-Playtime is from 20oClock CET for atleast 2 Games.
-Iam looking for a Toplaner, Jungler and ADc.
-Sub-Spot for Midlane is free.
-We will use Skype/TS for communication.
-be atleast 18years old
-Wish to be part of something more then just a grp of people who just play the same Game
-Play atleast 3hours aDay
-Dont be in BronzeElo
-Pls rly main the role u apply for 
-I will play some Normals with u to see how u behave in different situatuions and get used to your championpool.



if ur interrested pls apply here and/or addme ingame for a chat.

Strawhatya
